verses.text: Ex vuninal, chaec eyab' in lolonel svala'. Maclejec eyab'i yic wach' ol jelanb'oc e pensar yuj.
Ha k'ayb'ub'al te wach' svak' t'ayex, yuj chi' tzeyailejnhej t'a masanil tiempo.
Ayic quelem unin in, ayinto ek' t'a yol spat in mam, yelxo val xajanab'il in yuj ix in nun.
Ha t'a jun pekti’ chi', icha tik ajnac yak'an in k'ayb'ub'al vinh in mam. Yalannac vinh icha tik: Sik'kan in lolonel tik t'a a pensar, k'anab'ajej tas sval tik, yic wach' ay a q'uinal.
Cha a jelanil yet' a wach' pensaril, manh ak'b'at in lolonel tik satk'olal.
Xajanej a jelanil, manh a patiquejeli, yujto ol ach colchaj yuj.
Yovalil tza sayek' jelanil t'a junjun k'u. Wach'chom ajaltac tz'aj yilchaj uuj, palta te wach' ama tato a tza b'ab'laj sayejek' t'a yichanh juntzanhxo tas ay t'ayach.
Nib'ejoch jelanil, yic wach' ol ach ik'jocchaanh yuj, yic wach' niwan ol aj elk'och t'a yol sat eb' etanimail.
Ha yuj jelanil chi', wach' ol ach elk'ochoc, ol och q'uelan eb' anima yuj a jelanil chi', xchican vinh in mam chi' t'ayin.
Axo ticnaic ach vuninal, cha val ab' juntzanh in lolonel tik, yic wach' ol najatb'oc a q'uinal.
Ha in ol ach vik' b'ey t'a sb'eyb'al eb' jelan, ol vak'an a b'eyb'alej tojolal.
Ha t'a tojol b'eyb'al chi', malaj tas ol ach yamanoch vaan, wach'chom yelk'olal ol ach b'atoc, palta manh ol ach telvoclaj.
Ak'och a pensar t'a k'ayb'ub'al tik, manh a patiquejeli. Yelxo val tza b'eyb'alej yic wach' ay a q'uinal.
Manh ach b'at tzak'an t'a spatic eb' chuk sb'eyb'al, manh a k'ulej icha tas sk'ulej eb'.
B'esel a b'ha t'a skal eb', ak' ip a b'eyb'alan wach'il.
Max ochlaj svayanh eb' tato max sk'ulej chukal eb', max yik'laj yip eb', tato malaj junok mach syixtej eb'.
Ha chukal yet' ixtoj anima, a juntzanh chi' svael eb' yaji.
Ha sb'eyb'al eb' tojol spensar, lajan icha ayic vanto sakb'i masanto sq'ue k'u, scheclaj spatic yichanh eb' yuj.
Axo sb'eyb'al eb' chuk spensar jun, lajan icha yic tzonh b'eyek' t'a skal k’ik’ k’inal, manh chequeloc b'aj sco tenoch coc.
Ach vuninal, cha ab' in lolonel tik, maclej val ab' sik'lab'il.
Mocab' iq'uel a sat t'ay, sik'kan t'a a pensar,
yujto a juntzanh lolonel tik tz'ak'an sq'uinal eb' tz'ilchaj yuj.
Tza ya'ilej a pensar t'a yichanh masanil tastac ay t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik, yujto a a pensar chi' tzach cuchb'an t'a wach'il, ma t'a chukal.
Manh esalvumoc tzutej a b'a, manh a comon alej pax chukal lolonel.
Te tojolnhej tzach b'at t'a ichanh t'a sb'eal wach'il, manh ach b'at q'uelan t'a tas malaj swach'il.
Tza ya'ilej val tas tza k'ulej icha val co sik'lan co b'e b'aj tzonh b'eyi, aocab' val sb'eal wach'il b'aj tzach ochi.
Manh ach elcan t'a jun b'e te tojol, manh ach b'atcan t'a sb'eal chukal.
